content:
Make the Most of the Refreshed Referral Promotion Guided Flow

The guided flow is now more intuitive and oriented to how marketing managers plan their referral promotions. In the second step, marketing managers can decide the promotion's reward for advocates and their friends. After selecting rewards, they can customize the promotion email content based on the selected rewards. The promotion emails and widget are grouped by stage, with dynamic updates based on when the template rewards advocates and friends. In the last step, marketing managers can review which assets are activated in each stage and which stages issue rewards.

Where: This change applies to Lightning Experience in Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer editions where Referral Marketing is enabled.

Why: If a promotion's template doesn't reward referred friends, the marketing manager can't select a reward for the referred friends. The content of emails targeted towards friends doesn't mention rewards. If a promotion uses a template that rewards advocates and friends at the last stage, the last stage's emails contain their reward details.
title: Refined Referral Promotion Guidelines in Salesforce
